div.div:
Decatur County School District
Excellence, Engagement, and Accountability for all!

img.title: Congratulations to Bainbridge High's 2020 Star Student, Hannah Sprenkle, and her selected Star Teacher, Mr. Jodie Sprenkle.
img.alt: Congratulations to Bainbridge High's 2020 Star Student, Hannah Sprenkle, and her selected Star Teacher, Mr. Jodie Sprenkle.

img.title: Mrs. Griffin, a dental hygienist, visited Mrs. McMillan's PreK class to teach all about dental health.

img.title: Mrs. Worsley's students are studying fish classification, natural selection, and speciation, using fresh fish from Lake Seminole.

a.title: Last Day of School for Students/ Early Release

div.a: Last Day of School for Students/ Early Release

div.p:
OUR MISSION.....
To empower all students to
engage and succeed in a global society
by providing rigorous and equitable opportunities,
nurturing environments, sustained partnerships,
college and career readiness and character development.

ul.li: Implement technology for teaching and learning
Develop and improve stakeholder engagement, satisfaction, and loyalty
Support a positive school system culture and climate
Provide all stakeholders with a voice
